About Me!

About Me

Hello! I am a Software Engineer currently residing in Queens, New York. I enjoy exploring new ideas and working with complex concepts. I originally started my college career majoring in accounting, then trying elementary education. Although I enjoyed them, I could not see myself furthering a career in those. I then tried my hands at software development, where I have found a fiery, new passion. I look forward to working along like-minded people to innovate useful software for others.
